about.pageDescription: Learn about Techstack Belgium, our mission, data sources, and methodology for mapping Belgian tech companies.
about.title: About Techstack Belgium
about.subtitle: Discover how we build Belgium's most comprehensive tech company directory
about.missionText: Techstack Belgium is an open-source directory designed to map and showcase Belgian tech companies. We provide verified, up-to-date information about company locations, tech stacks, and sizes. Our goal is to make it easy for developers, investors, and job seekers to discover and learn about the Belgian tech ecosystem.
about.dataSourceText: Our company database is built from official Belgian business registry data, enriched with company-provided information and community contributions.
about.dataSourcingNBB: National Bank of Belgium Developer Portal
about.dataSourcingEnd: to fetch company and employee data.
about.methodologyIntro: We follow a strict, five-step filtering process to identify qualified Belgian tech companies:
about.step1Text: We begin with all registered companies in the Belgian Central Business Registry (CBE) as of November 30, 2026.
about.step2Text: We select only companies classified under specific NACE activity codes related to software development and IT services:
about.nace62200: Other information technology and computer service activities
about.step3Text: We verify that companies have at least one physical office location in Belgium, ensuring we represent only companies with actual presence in the country.
about.step4Title: Filter by Active Status (2024 Annual Filings)
about.step4Text: We verify companies are still active by checking the National Bank of Belgium for annual account filings in 2024, confirming the company still exists and is operational.
about.step5Text: We extract Full-Time Employee (FTE) counts from structured JSON-XBRL annual accounts and remove companies with fewer than 2 FTE. Companies with fewer than 2 FTE are typically owner-managed entities with no separate operational team. For comparability, we exclude these by default.
about.qualityPoint1: Verified company information from official government registries
about.qualityPoint2: Community-driven updates and submissions for tech stacks and proof links
about.qualityPoint3: Automated screenshot capture for proof validation
about.qualityPoint4: Regular data refreshes to maintain accuracy and relevance
about.verificationIntro: We offer two ways to verify company tech stack submissions, ensuring data quality and authenticity:
about.verificationByEmailText: Submitters can verify their company by confirming their email address matches the company's domain (e.g., {'@'}company.com). This provides quick verification that the submitter has access to the company email system.
about.verificationByProofText: Alternatively, submitters can provide proof URLs such as job postings, documentation, or public references that clearly demonstrate the company's technology stack.
about.communityText: Is your company missing or outdated? We welcome tech stack submissions and updates. Every verified tech stack contributes to a better understanding of Belgium's tech landscape.
about.contactText: Have questions about our data, methodology, or want to contribute? Please reach out to us on GitHub. We're always looking for feedback and community contributions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we handle your data
privacy.pageDescription: Privacy policy explaining how Techstack Belgium handles email verification and company data

emailUsage.title: Email Usage for Verification
emailUsage.purpose: When you submit a company using email verification, we collect your email address solely for the purpose of verifying your company's tech stack submission.
emailUsage.verification: Your email is used to send a one-time verification link. Once you click this link and complete the verification process, your email serves as proof that the submission was made by someone with access to a company email address.
emailUsage.deletion: After verification is complete and your company is added to our directory, your email address is permanently deleted from our database. We do not store, share, or use your email for any other purposes.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.types: We collect the following types of data:
dataCollection.companyInfo: Company information from official Belgian registries (CBE database)
dataCollection.proofUrls: Proof URLs (when using URL verification method)
dataCollection.emailTemp: Email addresses temporarily for verification (deleted after verification)

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.companyData: Company information, tech stacks, and locations are retained permanently as part of our public directory to serve the Belgian tech community.
dataRetention.emailData: Email addresses used for verification are deleted immediately after successful verification completion.
